sen.j: 小野 小贄（おの の おにえ、生没年不詳）は、奈良時代の貴族。
sen.e: Ono no onie (year of birth and death unknown) is a court noble in the Nara Period.
Ono no onie (year of birth and death unknown) is a court noble in the Nara Period.
Ono no onie (year of birth and death unknown) is a court noble in the Nara Period.

sen.j: 本姓は小野朝臣（おののあそみ）。
sen.e: His main name is Ono no asomi.
His main name is Ono no asomi.
His main name is Ono no asomi.

sen.j: 聖武天皇の御世の天平勝宝4年5月5日 (旧暦)（752年6月24日）に従五位下を授かり、同年11月3日 (旧暦)（同年12月17日）に下野国守に任じられた。
sen.e: On June 24, 752 in the reign of Emperor Shomu, he was granted Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), and on December 17, in the same year, he was appointed to Shimotsuke no kuni no kami (the governor of Shimotsuke Province).

On June 24, 752 in the reign of Emperor Shomu, he was granted Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), and on December 17 in the same year, he was appointed to Shimotsuke no kuni no kami (the governor of Shimotsuke Province).
sen.cmt: ・日付とin the same yearの間にはカンマは必要ないので削除しました。
sen.e: On June 24, 752 in the reign of Emperor Shomu, he was granted Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), and on December 17 in the same year, he was appointed to Shimotsuke no kuni no kami (the governor of Shimotsuke Province).

sen.j: 淳仁天皇の御世となった天平宝字7年1月9日 (旧暦)（763年1月9日）から内蔵助、そして同年4月14日 (旧暦)（同年6月4日）からは少輔を務めた。
sen.e: On January 9, 763, in the reign of Emperor Junnin, he commenced to serve as Kura no suke (a position of the Bureau of Palace Storehouses), and on June 4, in the same year, he commenced to serve as Shoyu (Junior Assistant Minister).

On January 9, 763, in the reign of Emperor Junnin, he commenced to serve as Kura no suke (a position of the Bureau of Palace Storehouses), and on June 4 in the same year, he commenced to serve as Shoyu (Junior Assistant Minister).
sen.cmt: ・日付とin the same yearの間にはカンマは必要ないので削除しました。
sen.e: On January 9, 763, in the reign of Emperor Junnin, he commenced to serve as Kura no suke (a position of the Bureau of Palace Storehouses), and on June 4 in the same year, he commenced to serve as Shoyu (Junior Assistant Minister).

sen.j: 翌年1月21日 (旧暦)（764年3月2日）からは紀伊国守を務めることとなり赴任した。
sen.e: He was transferred to Kii Province as he commenced to serve as Kii no kuni no kami (the governor of Kii Province) on March 2, 764.
He was transferred to Kii Province as he commenced to serve as Kii no kuni no kami (the governor of Kii Province) on March 2, 764.
He was transferred to Kii Province as he commenced to serve as Kii no kuni no kami (the governor of Kii Province) on March 2, 764.

sen.j: 称徳天皇の御世となった天平神護元年1月7日 (旧暦)（765年2月9日）に従五位上に昇進、同年2月8日 (旧暦)（同年3月8日）からは右衛士督を務めた。
sen.e: On February 9, 765, in the reign of Emperor Shotoku, he was promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade), and on March 8 in the same year, he commenced to serve as Ueji no kami (Guard chief).

On February 9, 765, in the reign of Empress Shotoku, he was promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade), and on March 8 in the same year, he commenced to serve as Ueji no kami (Guard chief).
sen.cmt: ・称徳天皇は女性なのでEmpressとしました。
sen.e: On February 9, 765, in the reign of Empress Shotoku, he was promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade), and on March 8 in the same year, he commenced to serve as Ueji no kami (Guard chief).

sen.j: その10月、称徳天皇は紀伊国に行幸された。
sen.e: In October in the same year, Emperor Shotoku visited Kii Province.
In October in the same year, Empress Shotoku visited Kii Province.
sen.cmt: ・称徳天皇は女性なのでEmpressとしました。
sen.e: In October in the same year, Empress Shotoku visited Kii Province.

sen.j: 紀伊守の小贄はこれに同行し、同年10月22日 (旧暦)（同年12月13日）に正五位下に昇進した。
sen.e: Onie, who was Kii no kami (Governor of Kii Province), accompanied the emperor, and was promoted to Shogoinoge (Senior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) on December 13 in the same year.
Onie, who was Kii no kami (Governor of Kii Province), accompanied her, and was promoted to Shogoinoge (Senior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) on December 13 in the same year.
sen.cmt: ・称徳天皇については前述されており、また女性なのでherとしました。
sen.e: Onie, who was Kii no kami (Governor of Kii Province), accompanied her, and was promoted to Shogoinoge (Senior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) on December 13 in the same year.

sen.j: その26日に一行は和泉国日根郡の深日行宮まで戻って来たがここで天候が悪化。
sen.e: On the 26th of December, when they reached 深日行宮 in Hine-gun, Izumi Province on the way back home, the weather worsened.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処深日行宮→定訳・読み方不明のため原文のままとしています。
sen.e: On the 26th of December, when they reached Fuke Angu (temporary lodging built to accommodate an Imperial visit) in Hine-gun, Izumi Province on the way back home, the weather worsened.
sen.cmt: ・「深日行宮」の読みは、以下のサイトを参考にしました。http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:7q28bHfhEhwJ:kamnavi.jp/en/izumi/fuke.htm+%E6%B7%B1%E6%97%A5%E8%A1%8C%E5%AE%AE&cd=2&hl=ja&ct=clnk&gl=jp
sen.e: On the 26th of December, when they reached Fuke Angu (temporary lodging built to accommodate an Imperial visit) in Hine-gun, Izumi Province on the way back home, the weather worsened.

sen.j: 小贄は一行と別れて帰途に就いた。
sen.e: Onie went a separate way for home.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Onie went a separate way for home.
Onie went a separate way for home.

sen.j: この折、称徳天皇から紬30疋と綿200屯を賜った。
sen.e: At this time, he was granted tsumugi (pongee) 30 hiki and cotton 200 hiki by Emperor Shotoku.
At this time, he was granted tsumugi (pongee) 30 hiki and cotton 200 hiki by Empress Shotoku.
sen.cmt: ・称徳天皇は女性なのでEmpressとしました。
sen.e: At this time, he was granted tsumugi (pongee) 30 hiki and cotton 200 hiki by Empress Shotoku.

sen.j: 神護景雲3年8月19日 (旧暦)（769年9月27日）、小贄は中務大輔に任じられた。
sen.e: On September 27, 769, Onie was appointed to Nakatsukasa no taifu (Senior Assistant Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: On September 27, 769, Onie was appointed to Nakatsukasa no taifu (Senior Assistant Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).
On September 27, 769, Onie was appointed to Nakatsukasa no taifu (Senior Assistant Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).

sen.j: 翌年の宝亀元年6月16日 (旧暦)（771年7月17日）には大宰少貳、また翌年9月16日 (旧暦)（772年10月20日）には摂津国大夫を拝命した。
sen.e: On July 17, 771, in the following year, he was assigned to 大宰少貳, and on October 20, 772, he was assigned to daibu (master) of Settsu Province.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処大宰少貳→定訳不明のため原文のままとしています。
sen.e: On July 17, 771 in the following year, he was assigned to Dazai no shoni, and on October 20, 772, he was assigned to daibu (master) of Settsu Province.
sen.cmt: ・日付とin the following yearの間にはカンマは必要ないので削除しました。・「大宰少貳」は「だざいのしょうに」と読むようです。http://kazenoyadori.seesaa.net/article/140221747.html
sen.e: On July 17, 771 in the following year, he was assigned to Dazai no shoni, and on October 20, 772, he was assigned to daibu (master) of Settsu Province.
